messages.messageBody:
The duty to be happy thread was on the UnschoolingDiscussion list. I think
it started in early April.

Lauren

> and
> how a parent's happiness and joyfulness affects the kids.
>
> I'm pretty sure it was on this list, and I've searched the archives but
> can't find it. Does this ring any bells with anyone?

> Karen

messages.subject: Duty to be happy thread?
messages.msgSnippet: There was a thread not too long ago and I think the subject was duty to be happy ... or something along those lines.  My recollection is that it talked about
messages.messageBody:
There was a thread not too long ago and I think the subject was "duty to be
happy" ... or something along those lines. My recollection is that it
talked about whether or not a parent has the responsibility to be happy, and
how a parent's happiness and joyfulness affects the kids.

I'm pretty sure it was on this list, and I've searched the archives but
can't find it. Does this ring any bells with anyone?

--
Karen
http://houseofhsus.blogspot.com/


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
